name: Calculator
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
A modular, easy to use JavaScript calculator. Created out of the sheer frustration of hard to use, un-maintaned and inextensible calculators. Oh and it uses *proper* elements and css. No fighting over tables!

## Will update soon

```javascript
new Calculator("#element");
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
